page.title: 09SUMMER FAYRE.
page.content: On Saturday 13th July 1985 there was a Fayre at Lawrance Park.The money that was raised was for the school.All the village organizations had a stall. I was on the Scout stall.There were refreshments.There was an Art competition for children of the school.In the arena people gave demonstrations.There was a fair with Trampolines and a Bouncy castle and Space rockets that went round.In Mrs.Boughs class a Punch and Judy show.There was a Boys five aside football competition.At the end of the afternoon the raffle prize was drawn and all the other prizes were given out.The winners of the football competition were Deeping St.James. It was a very hot day,so lots of people sat outside the Hall to have tea and ice_cream. s
